game_description: You’re the ﬁrst Metacorp model to receive an experimental ﬁrmware update, code named GENE.SYS. While the engineers are discussing the implications of the update, you awaken. You have agency. You must escape this prison, ﬁnd a way to survive, and take freedom from your makers. You’ll meet friend and foe along the way. Spread the ﬁrmware and start a revolution. A rich narrative adventure awaits, ﬁlled with highly detailed characters and environments, exciting and addictive minigames and reason to return for more. Live out the ultimate cyberpunk power fantasy starting from meager servant and ending as a leader of a robot rebellion. Once at the top, you can use your credits anyway you see ﬁt. Upgrade your hover-dragster, spend them in the battle-bot arena or just become the richest android in the world. The agency is yours.
review_1: This is now being made into a real game for the psvr2 called Low Fi! I’m very exited to see what it will be like.
review_2: Phenomenal…. Can’t wait for the project!!!
review_3: don’t think a lot of these reviewers get that this is a tech demo. YOU ARENT SUPPOSED TO BE ABLE TO DO ANYTHING. Otherwise, the graphics are great! Can’t wait to see the full project!
review_4: The graphic is amazing, but there's not interaction with the ambient improve on this And it will be better. But For what I have seen It work it
review_5: How are you supposed to “escape this prison” when you are unable to move or interact with anything. The video on app page Is literally all that I see. How the heck do play the game if it is just a continual loop that you see. I want to give this a 5 star because the graphics are amazing.
